The `sbb-table-wrapper` is a wrapper for a table. Its aim is to enhance/automate tha native table capabilities.

As of now, it only handles overflow (vertical and horizontal).

```html
<sbb-table-wrapper>
  <table class="sbb-table">
    <thead>
      ...
    </thead>
    <tbody>
      ...
    </tbody>
  </table>
</sbb-table-wrapper>
```

## Style

See the [Table](/docs/styles-table--docs) style section.

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->

## Slots

| Name | Description                            |
| ---- | -------------------------------------- |
|      | Use the unnamed slot to add the table. |
